phrases: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica 07
My Motherboard is dead.
(Alternately
You are thinking too naively about fighting.
I know I suck at this part)
(OP)
(Episode title) Can I face my true feelings?
ED
Episode 7 Can I face my true feelings?
Episode 7 Can I face my true feelings?
Episode 7 Can I face my true feelings?
Tensugi Takashi
Episode 8 I am such an idiot
You lied to us.
I simply asked you to become a Magical Girl.
Though you could say that I left out some things.
Why did not you tell us?
Because you did not ask.
Everything would have been fine if you had not found out.
Even Mami never realized it.
It is not like humans such as yourself are even aware of their souls to begin with.
It resides in the firing of your neurons.
It is there in your blood and in the beating of your heart.
If your body ceases to function,
your soul will also cease to be.
In order to prevent that, I made your souls tangible.
I simply made them into something that you can easily hold on to and protect.
I did all of this so that you could fight Witches more effectively.
I never asked you to do something like that!
You are not taking this seriously enough.
For example, let us say that you were to be stabbed in the stomach with a spear...
This is true pain.
You are down for the count after just one hit.
The only reason you were able to last as long as you did against Kyouko...
This is possible because your soul and your body have been separated.
That is the only reason you survived.
After a while, you will learn to completely block out the pain.
Although that would also dull your reflexes, so I would not recommend it.
Why?
Why must we do this?
Did you not have a wish you wanted fulfilled even if it meant a life of constant battle?
Has not it already been granted?
All rise.
Bow.
You already knew, did not you?
Why did not you tell us?
Nobody has ever believed me before.
Why would Kyubei do something so cruel?
He does not believe what he is doing is cruel.
A creature like him has no concept of human values.
He will just say that it is a fair price for a miracle.
It is not fair at all!
You saw what he did to her!
Sayaka-chan only wanted to heal the one she loved.
You cannot say that was not a miracle.
The impossible was made possible.
Even if Miki Sayaka were to spend her entire life taking care of him...
Even an entire human life is not equivalent to a miracle.
But that is precisely what he is selling.
Will Sayaka-chan never be able to return to normal?
I will say this again.
Give up on Miki Sayaka.
But Sayaka-chan saved my life.
If she had not become a Magical Girl,
both Hitomi and I would have died!
Do not confuse gratitude for responsibility.
There is nothing you can do for her now.
You should not feel any responsibility to her just because you do not want to feel accountable.
Why are you always so cold, Homura-chan?
You are right.
I wonder if it is because I am no longer human.
How can I even face Kyosuke like this?
Hey, Blockhead.
How long are you going to keep moping around for?
Let us go for a walk.
I have something to talk to you about.
So are you regretting having this done to your body?
I think I am pretty okay with it.
Regardless, I am able to do what I want because of this power I have obtained.
It is not something you should be so upset over.
In your case, I would say you are getting your just desserts.
Exactly.
Just think of it like that.
If you live only for your own sake, you are responsible for everything you do.
You have got no reason to be mad and nothing to regret.
It is a lot easier if you think of it like that.
Why did you bring me here?
It is kind of a long story.
You hungry?
Never waste food in front of me...
This used to be my father's church.
He was too kind and honest for his own good.
Everyday, he would cry as he read the newspaper.
He was seriously distressed over the state of the world.
He believed a new doctrine was necessary for this new era.
That was what he believed.
So he began preaching things that were not a part of the usual teachings.
Of course, everyone stopped coming to the church.
He was even excommunicated from the main branch of the church.
No one took my father's words seriously.
It was to be expected.
To an outsider, it looked like some kind of weird cult.
No matter how obvious the messages my father tried to convey,
people would shun him everywhere he went.
We had no food and no place to stay.
I could not accept it.
He had not said anything wrong.
It was just different.
That is all.
If they would just take five minutes to listen to what he had to say,
they would understand that he was not wrong.
But even so...
It was painful.
I could not forgive them.
The fact that nobody would listen to him seriously...
I could not accept it.
That is why I asked Kyubei to grant my wish.
I wished that everyone would heed my father's words.
The next day, people were coming from all over to my father's church.
The numbers increased so much it was startling.
The whole while I did my best as a Magical Girl.
No matter how righteous my father's teachings were...
It was my turn to shine.
I worked hard like an idiot.
With one of us up on stage, and one of us in the back...
But you see,
my father found out about it.
When he realized that people were coming because of magic rather than faith,
my father was furious.
He called me, his own daughter, a deceiving witch.
Is not that a laugh?
I was out there fighting Witches every night.
That is when my father broke down.
It was quite the spectacle.
He would drink himself silly every night as though he were possessed.
He eventually got everyone together and burned everything.
I was the only one left.
The wish I made destroyed my family.
It is because I made it without considering other people's feelings.
Because of that it was a disaster.
I made a promise to myself back then.
I vowed never to use magic for the sake of another again.
This power is only to be used for myself.
Miracles are not free.
If you wish for hope, you will send out an equal amount of despair.
They are one and the same.
That is how the balance of this world is preserved.
Why did you tell me this?
I think you should change that willful attitude of yours.
It is a life of just desserts.
Is not this strange?
You live only for your own sake.
Why are you so concerned about me?
We both started from a mistaken conclusion.
There is no reason for you to continue on the path you have chosen.
You already paid plenty for it.
That is why...
Like you?
That is right.
I can see the differences between us.
And I can see that you have started down the wrong path.
I cannot just sit and watch.
I think I misunderstood you before.
I apologize for that.
However,
I do not regret using my wish for another's sake.
If I regret my decision now...
That is my answer.
What are you...
As for me,
I do not think I paid too high of a price.
If used correctly, this power is truly a beautiful thing.
By the way...
Where did you get those apples?
Where did you get the money to pay for them?
You cannot say, can you?
In that case, I cannot eat that apple.
It would not make me happy at all to receive one.
You fool!
We are Magical Girls!
There are no others like us!
I will fight in my way.
If you do not like it,
you are free to try and kill me like you did before.
I will not lose.
No hard feelings.
Sayaka-chan, good morning!
Good morning, Sayaka-chan.
M-Morning!
Where were you yesterday?
Oh, I just had a slight cold.
Sayaka-chan.
It is all right.
I am fine.
Do not worry.
Well then, let us
Oh?
Was Kamijo-kun already discharged from the hospital?
Kamijo, are you doing all right?
Yeah.
It will not help if I just stay home all day.
I am supposed to be walking without crutches next week.
I am so happy for him.
You should go say hi to him.
You have not greeted him yet.
It is fine.
What did you want to talk about?
It is a matter regarding love.
You see...
I have been hiding something from you and Madoka-san.
Huh?
For a long time now...
I have admired Kamijo Kyosuke-kun.
I-I see...
Who would have thought?
That Kyosuke sure is a popular guy.
You and he grew up together, right?
Well, if I had to say...
I would say we just cannot get rid of each other.
Is that really all?
I have made my decision.
I will no longer lie to myself.
What about you?
Sayaka-san, can you face your true feelings?
Wh-What are you talking about?
You are a very important friend to me.
I do not want this to turn into something bad.
You have had your eye on Kamijo-kun for much longer than I have.
So you should get first pick.
Hitomi...
I will confess to Kamijo-kun after school tomorrow.
I will give you one day.
I would like you to make a choice that you will not regret.
You have to decide whether you want to tell him how you feel.
Madoka...
Can I come with you?
I do not want you to be alone.
So please...
Why are you...
Why are you so kind?
I am not worth your time.
That is not true.
I had a regret today.
I thought, what if I had not saved Hitomi?
It crossed my mind.
I am completely unqualified to be an ally of justice.
There is no way I can face Mami-san like this.
Hitomi is going to steal Kyosuke from me!
But there is nothing I can do!
I am already dead!
I am a zombie!
I cannot ask him to hold me with a body like this!
I cannot ask him to kiss me!
Thank you.
I am sorry.
Sayaka-chan...
I am okay now.
I feel better after crying.
Let us go.
We have Witches to hunt.
You are only watching?
That is unexpected.
She is fighting a Witch tonight, not a familiar.
It should drop some Grief Seeds.
This will not be for nothing.
So you are letting her have your prey for that reason?
That idiot!
She is losing already.
Sayaka-chan!
I cannot bear to watch any more of this.
That is enough.
Why do not you rest for a bit?
Let me show you how it is done.
Hey!
Do not interfere.
I can handle this on my own.
Sayaka-chan!
She could not have...
It is really true!
With a body like this...
Stop...
Please stop...
I am going to be a different Magical Girl from all of you.
I have decided that.
I do not need anything in return.
I will not use magic for my own sake.
I am such an idiot.
